title: New Champion Confirmed
body:
During Todays patch notes Scarizard told us of a BRAND NEW CHAMPION hitting the rift
http://imgur.com/hnumfeN
This "Galio" champion has a spell that makes him move faster, and that sounds pretty OP
I hope they nerf him

replies.body: Galio? Surely, you mean Galileo, the Italian astronomer of the late-1500s?
No, that's Yorik

> [{quoted}](name=hoes and bows,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=shE3oqh3,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2016-04-20T05:19:03.254+0000)
>
> No, that's Yorik

Who?
He's the owner of that skull from Macbeth :p

I think it's this guy.

http://www.mobafire.com/images/champion/skins/landscape/urgot-classic.jpg
who's he? I feel like I've seen it before :/
{{champion:28}} this guy?
how could you forget yorrick morey?
Riot basically pushed the sleeper op into the meta.
Legit, i bought him not to long ago JUST so when the mage update came out i could climb elo like a reking ball

OMG!  I can't tell you guys how pumped I am that a brand new champion is about to hit the rift!  I can't wait to see his macro-level gameplay manuvers.  Pair him with Sivir for quick rotations and turret take-downs!
Is he based on Galileo? He was an astronomer, so he should counter {{champion:136}}
no I think he's based on a galleon
Dang Brits, invading our games again

> [{quoted}](name=AngusBoomPants,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=shE3oqh3,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2016-04-20T11:04:46.524+0000)
>
> Is he based on Galileo? He was an astronomer, so he should counter {{champion:136}}

Nope, he is {{champion:136}} ally and support, just like Copernicus and Kepler

Aristotle and Ptolemy are {{champion:136}} 's counter
what's a galio?
I think it's a type of ship.
Galio confirmed

Don't you mean Gigan?

http://media2.picsearch.com/is?hNj6nqdSKTvMSonEg9z6iEaC1R-Z5LORO8HYxa3Zk_8&height=285
They're referring to that newest Malphite skin. They're worried people didn't buy it enough. ;p
*insert actual serious comment about looking forward to playing more Galio here*

Galio is already a champion...released 8-10 of 2010....do your homework FFS

http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Galio
http://ci.memecdn.com/559/7012559.jpg

Dude I heard he had a built in smite on his kit.
Gonna be op in the jungle with that double smite.
Galio? Is he a corgi or something?

> [{quoted}](name=C9 Kitty,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=shE3oqh3,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2016-04-20T10:38:50.529+0000)
>
> Galio? Is he a corgi or something?

My dog is half-corgi half-basset hound, but I don't see what this has to do with Galion, Ohio.
The new champion is based on controversial filmmaker Vincent Gallo.
Anyone want to speculate on what this "Galio" is. I wonder what he looks like personally.
